ARABIC: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There is a reminder in that for anyone who has a heart, or who listens well, having seen the evidence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely there is a reminder in this for whosoever has a heart (to feel), or takes heed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily there is a lesson in this for everyone who has a (sound) heart and who listens with an attentive mind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is a reminder for everyone who understands, listens, and sees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed in this is an advice for anyone who keeps a heart, or listens attentively.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, therein is indeed a reminder for him who has a heart or gives ear while he is heedful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely there is a reminder in this for him who has a heart or he gives ear and is a witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely in that there is a reminder to him who has a heart, or will give ear with a present mind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! therein verily is a reminder for him who hath a heart, or giveth ear with full intelligence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: There is truly a reminder in this for whoever has a heart, whoever listens attentively.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily herein is an admonition Unto him who hath a heart, or giveth ear while he is heedful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There is indeed an admonition in that for one who has a heart, or gives ear, being attentive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily in this is a Message for any that has a heart and understanding or who gives ear and earnestly witnesses (the truth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, therein is indeed a reminder for him who has a heart or gives ear while he is heedful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, in this there is a Reminder for he who has a heart or listens attentively while witnessing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In that is a reminder for whoever possesses a heart, or cares to listen and witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:37] Assuredly there is in that, which is mentioned, a reminder, an admonition, for him who has a heart, a mind, or gives ear, [or] listens to admonitions, in [full] witness, present in heart [and mind].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! Therein) in that which was done with them (verily is a reminder) for your folk (for him who hath a heart) a living heart, (or giveth ear) or listens to the Qur'an (with full intelligence) with focus and not absentmindedly.
